// added manually: mt and mti state variables threadprivate
// credit: Tim Davis from SuiteSparse/CHOLMOD
// see https://github.com/DrTimothyAldenDavis/SuiteSparse/issues/375
// and https://github.com/DrTimothyAldenDavis/SuiteSparse/commit/f3ac3eafa6531569f03768af7def36d487c494db
#if defined ( _OPENMP )
    // OpenMP threadprivate is preferred
    static uint64_t mt[NN];
    static int mti=NN+1;
    #pragma omp threadprivate (mt,mti)
#else
    // gcc and many other compilers support the __thread keyword
    static __thread uint64_t mt[NN];
    static __thread int mti=NN+1;
#endif
